Name: Kirsch Cosmo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist .
Review: As the name suggests this is a riff on the classic Cosmopolitan using kirsch eau-de-vie in place of vodka.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2013 by Hannah Lanfear at Boisdale in Canary Wharf, London. The Cosmopolitan cocktail story
Nutrition: One serving of Kirsch Cosmo contains 153 calories
